comment_body:
What a sweet guy/girl/demon, letting her in so that she could have a good rest!

Polite entity aside, cool story. I don't know if the details has any foreshadow for the ending, but it's creepy alright. Imagine going into your home, super tired from work and sleepless days, and you probably won't even notice things like the door being unlocked, or breathing inside your house.
